label: AB_cP8_198_a_a-002
title: FeSi ($B20$) Structure
comments:
When $x_{1}=0$ and $x_{2}=1/2$, or $x_{1}=1/4$ and $x_{2}=3/4$, this lattice reduces to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cF8_225_a_b-001}{rock salt ($B1$) structure}. When $x_{1}=-x_{2}=1/8(\sqrt{5}-1)$ we have an ``idea'' structure where every atom is seven-fold coordinated. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cP8_198_a_a-002}{FeSi ($B20$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_cP8_198_a_a-001}{$\alpha$-CO ($B21$)} have the same AFLOW prototype label, AB\_cP8\_198\_a\_a.  They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
